name: Abhishek Chatterjee
title: Serverless Engineer & React Developer
about: Passionate Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience building scalable applications. Currently working as a Serverless Engineer at time.money (Fintech), where I build AWS Lambda functions using Serverless Framework and AWS SAM, design content schemas in Sanity CMS, and explore Temporal.io for durable workflow execution. Started my career as a Frontend Developer crafting UIs with React, TypeScript, and Redux. Beyond work, I'm constantly exploring new technologies like Docker for containerization and Biome.js for modern linting. I'm a big advocate of open source and love working with Linux servers, especially Ubuntu.

Architecting cloud-native solutions using AWS services (Lambda, Step Functions, EventBridge, SQS, SNS)
Exploring Temporal.io for durable execution and workflow orchestration

Building event-driven architectures for fintech applications
Working with latest technologies and modern tooling (Biome.js for linting)
